featured.text: One reason the earthquake caused such damage was that Bam's buildings were made mostly from baked mud.
Bam was a city of mud-brick houses, old monuments and an ancient castle.
When mothers try to dig their babies out, both may be trapped and smothered by thick mud.

other.text: Bam was best known for its 2,000-year-old castle built out of mud, straw, and the trunks of palm trees.
The use of baked mud for buildings explains ____________.
An old mud and straw castle.

definition.zh_def: 泥土，通常由水和土壤混合而成，具有黏性和可塑性。
definition.en_def: Soft, wet earth that is made by mixing water with soil.
definition.example: The children played in the mud after the rain.
